summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5805 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, T. J. Carle's Supplemental Plat of Block 8, of D. T. Denny's 2nd Addition to North Seattle, being the alleys between Eastlake Avenue and Yale Avenue North, from Valley Street to Aloha Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76515, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
